titleInfo.title: V. 1: The financing of education in the State of New York; V. 2: Elementary school costs in the state of New York; V. 3: The cost and support of secondary schools in the State of New York; V. 4: Bibliography on educational finance; V. 5: The fiscal administration of city school systems; V. 6: Financial statistics of public education in the United States, 1910-1920; V. 7: The cost of education in California; V. 8: The financing of education in Iowa; V. 9: The financing of public schools in the State of Illinois; V. 10: The political unit of public school finance in Illinois; V. 11: The public school debt in Illinois; V. 12: A stkudy of public school costs in Illinois cities; V. 13: Unit costs of higher education.
